SELECT m.id, m.code, m.name, m.manuscript_class, m.description, m.contributor, GROUP_CONCAT( u.nick_name SEPARATOR ' ' ) AS reviewer, m.view_count, c.NAME as conference, m.status, m.creation_time FROM t_manuscript m LEFT JOIN t_conference c ON m.conference_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_user_manuscript um ON um.manuscript_id = m.id LEFT JOIN acl_user u ON u.id = um.user_id
${ew.customSqlSegment} and m.is_deleted=0
where m.is_deleted=0
GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.creation_time DESC
